name: Cosmic Power
summary: Boosts the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.
viability: Especially with Magic Guard users like Sigilyph and Clefable, Cosmic Power can turn the entire tide of a match. After a few boosts, bulky Pok√©mon will be virtually impossible to take down unless they set up alongside, phase them out, Taunt them, or get a lucky critical hit. Sigilyph is the most famous user of this move, mostly due to its Speed. It's well worth running Cosmic Power.
